title: High-End Features, Pool, Upscale 1+1 in West Hollywood, 1 Month Free!
posting_body: Welcome home to Selworth Apartments, located in West Hollywood, CA.
Our apartment homes are fully renovated and include hardwood style flooring, modern kitchen appliances, and much more.
Community amenities include a pool, subterranean parking, laundry on site, and more.
Additional Fees and Deposit May Apply.
Price & availability are subject to change.
Square footage may not be exact.
Interior photos may not be of exact unit.
